::Battera::
She ran throught the room and dodged the hail of lazar fire and made it to 
the control panel. She got underneith the panel and ripped out all the wires 
she could.  The lazar fire stopped.  She went to Vulois.
"Let's go.  We need to get out of here."
She flew up and went out a ventalator shaft and outside the ship.  She 
headed to Hellbeast's base.

---------orginal message----------
>From: minime_316@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Vulois is stil trapped inside the Predacon ship rafters, trying to
>avoid Predacon fire. He can't do it for much longer, they are getting
>more accurate. Than he hears the small whisper come from the batt
>Pred. He responds in a secret Predacon frequency.
>
>"I would love to come down right now, but you see I'm being fired
>upon. If you really want to go home, try to talk Hell Beast into
>thinking about my offer."
>
>Vulois pulls out his other blaster. This could get ugly. He shouts
>down again to Hell Beast.
>
>"What do you have to lose? If you don't take my offer, I'm going to
>come down and start attacking wildly. Of course I will die, but I
>could severly damage the ship and take a few Preds with me. That puts
>you at a major disadvantage. If you take my offer though, all you
>have to do is give my friend and I a little promotion and you will
>have the most advanced technology on this planet, putting you at a
>great spot to win the Neo Beast Wars. This is the last time I will
>offer, or I'm going to come down and reak Havoc on this base. Also
>I'll press this litle button on this machine, and whipe the memory of
>one of your preds, whoever it may be. Than it might decide to trot
>off and start anew, and than you're down another Pred. What'll it be?"
>
>Vulois sits back to let Hell Beast think about it, but than an
>emergency comes up. His regular scanners are telling him that some
>Maximals are taking the driver! He sends a signal to Soundwave.
>
>"Please, Soundwave, do everything in your power to keep that driver.
>Your new body can take the maximals. This whole deal depends on it!
>
>Than Vulois sends another secret message to the bat Pred.
>
>"Forget what I told you before. I need you to sneak out of the base
>and focus on the spark of Soundwave, another Pred. Some maximals are
>trying to take our ticket home! I need you to go help Soundwave
>protect it."
>
>Vulois sits back, with his blasters out. It's Hell Beast's move.
>
